name: Huang Jiashu
contact: Email: joshhuang1999@gmail.com | Contact Number: +65 9239 2378 | LinkedIn: Josh Huang |GitHub: josh-huang

profile: Technology professional with strong expertise in software development and backend systems, and a deep interest in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Experienced in backend development, systems maintenance, and secure coding, with a proven ability to deliver innovative and scalable solutions in dynamic environments. Passionate about leveraging data-driven approaches and intelligent systems to solve complex problems, and eager to advance knowledge in AI/ML through graduate study and hands-on research to create impactful solutions.
education: Singapore Institute of Technology – University of Glasgow                                                                   Sep 2020 to Aug 2023
B.Sc. (Hons) Computing Science (Internet of Things), Honors with Merit | CGPA: 3.61/5.00
projects: Personal Project
AI-Powered Resume Assistant (Ongoing)							Oct 2025 to Present
Building an interactive web-based assistant powered by OpenAI GPT models and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to answer questions about my professional background.
Implemented LangChain for contextual retrieval and prompt orchestration, integrating FAISS for efficient vector-based semantic search over structured resume content.
Developed a FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend to deliver a dynamic, responsive LLM-powered application, iterating on retrieval quality and prompt design.
AI Travel Agent (Ongoing) 							                             Sep 2025 to Present
Building an AI-powered travel assistant using LangChain and LangGraph to orchestrate multi-step tool calls for itinerary planning, budget estimation, and destination recommendations.
Integrating Bright Data and SerpAPI to retrieve live travel information (attractions, accommodations, and route options) and ground the agent’s responses in up-to-date external data.
Leveraging OpenAI ChatGPT models as the core reasoning engine to generate coherent, user-friendly travel plans based on tool outputs and user preferences.
CWT Globelink Pte Ltd
Cloud Freight Management System - Quick Quotation Module                                                                May 2025 to Present
Collaborated with my supervisor to design and implement a Quotation Module in Oracle APEX for the CFMS, enabling staff to generate customer quotations from operational inputs.
Developed backend logic in PL/SQL to automatically compute supplier costs, customer revenue, and profit margins based on configured rules.
Integrated email delivery with a pre-designed report template, streamlining quotation issuance and reducing manual calculation and formatting effort.
Singapore Institute of Technology – University of Glasgow
LNG Pipeline Health Monitoring System                                                                                                        Apr 2022 to Jul 2022
Led data cleaning, preprocessing, and feature selection for ultrasonic flowmeter datasets, consolidating multiple data sources into a consistent ML-ready pipeline.
Implemented supervised models (Non-linear SVM, Neural Network, Decision Tree) in Python (NumPy, Pandas, scikit-learn) to detect anomalies in LNG pipeline data.
Analyzed model performance and decision boundaries to enhance predictive accuracy and support pipeline safety monitoring and early fault detection.
Human Resource Application (Staff Portal)                                                                                                 Sep 2021 to Dec 2021
Worked in a team to design and build a company staff portal featuring resource booking, claim submission, leave application, and automated email notifications.
Developed the backend using Python (Django) with Firebase for authentication/data storage and JavaScript for interactive front-end components.
Delivered an integrated HR workflow that improved usability and demonstrated practical application of HCI principles in a full-stack web system.
TraceTogether Simulation                                                                                                                         Jan 2021 to April 2021
Collaborated with teammates from the Data Structures and Algorithms module to design algorithms and data structures to simulate COVID-19 contact tracing.
Implemented the simulation using Python, Google Maps API, and JavaScript, modelling interactions between individuals and locations.
Built a web interface that allows users to visualize close contacts and emerging clusters, demonstrating how algorithmic design supports public health analytics.
experience: CWT Globelink Pte Ltd                                                                                                                              Dec 2023 to Present
Maintain and enhance a large-scale Cloud Freight Management System (CFMS) on Oracle APEX, focusing on backend logic, data integrity, and performance using PL/SQL/Oracle SQL.
Develop new features, reports, and EDI/API integrations, building clean data flows and system interfaces that are directly applicable to data-driven and AI-enabled solutions.
Concorde Security Pte Ltd                                                                                                           Aug 2022 to Apr 2023
Built a Human Resource mobile app using Flutter, strengthening full-stack development and structured data handling.
Developed a Telegram bot to automate welfare check-ins, showcasing practical automation, event-driven design, and problem-solving.
SeQuax Private Ltd                                                                                                                        Mar 2019 to Aug 2019
Helped design and implement a smart office IoT solution using Home Assistant, integrating multiple devices and sensors into a unified control system.

Created a tablet-based dashboard for real-time device control, reinforcing skills in system integration, user-facing interfaces, and working with streaming sensor data relevant to future AI/IoT analytics.
skills: Programming: PL/SQL, Oracle SQL (Advanced), Python (Intermediate), Java, C (Basic)
Data / AI / ML Framework: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, LangChain, LangGraph
Backend, Web & App Dev: Oracle APEX (Advanced), FastAPI, Django, Spring Boot, RESTful API design, EDI integration, Next.js, Flutter (Basic)
Databases: Oracle SQL (Advanced), MySQL, PostgreSQL, Google Firebase, MongoDB (Basic)
Cloud & Tools: Oracle Cloud (GenAI, Vector Search), Google Cloud, AWS Cloud(Basic), UNIX/Linux, Git, Docker (Basic)
Fundamentals: Data Structures & Algorithms, Computer Networking, Operating Systems, Probability & Statistics, Linear Algebra
certifications: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 Certified Generative AI Professional
Oracle AL Vector Search Certified Professional
Diploma Plus Program – Certification in Aviation Management
Google Cloud Computing Foundations: Cloud Computing Fundamental
The Institution of Engineers, Singapore – Student Member
Harvard University CS50 Puzzle Day 2020 Certification

PROFILE

Technology professional with strong expertise in software development and backend systems, and a deep interest in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Experienced in backend development, systems maintenance, and secure coding, with a proven ability to deliver innovative and scalable solutions in dynamic environments. Passionate about leveraging data-driven approaches and intelligent systems to solve complex problems, and eager to advance knowledge in AI/ML through graduate study and hands-on research to create impactful solutions.
EDUCATION
Singapore Institute of Technology – University of Glasgow                                                                   Sep 2020 to Aug 2023
B.Sc. (Hons) Computing Science (Internet of Things), Honors with Merit | CGPA: 3.61/5.00
Singapore Polytechnic                                                                                                                                      Sep 2017 to Mar 2020
Diploma in Aerospace Electronics | CGPA: 3.53/4.00
